name: The Blood Moon Ball
description:
You’ve been invited to a great royal ball! The full moon is out tonight, and the whole kingdom is holding its breath to hear news of Prince Felix.

The royal family is not without enemies. But surely, nothing could go awry on this eerie autumnal night.

This game was made for my Game Design Lab class using Twine in early 2021.

This is not a major Signol Games release, but just a small experimental game to get into the Halloween spirit.
Stay spooky, everyone!
